changeSet.author: Daniel Michalski
changeSet.createView: SELECT c.name, c.surname, a.city FROM client c LEFT JOIN address a ON c.address_id = a.id ORDER BY c.name

changeSet.author: Daniel Michalski
changeSet.comment: Create number of empty rooms view
changeSet.createView: SELECT rs.status_description, COUNT(r_type.description) FROM room r LEFT JOIN rate rt ON rt.room_id = r.id LEFT JOIN room_type r_type ON rt.room_type_id = r_type.id LEFT JOIN room_status rs ON r.room_status_id = rs.id WHERE rs.id = 2 GROUP BY (rs.status_description)

changeSet.author: Daniel Michalski
changeSet.createView: SELECT c.email, COUNT(r.id) "Number of reservations" FROM client c LEFT JOIN reservation r ON c.id = r.client_id GROUP BY c.email ORDER BY "Number of reservations" DESC
